text:
I want to generate a DataFrame from a NamedTuple, but my code hangs for hours.  The NamedTuple has three symbols, each of which corresponds to a tuple of the first, second, and third powers of the numbers 1 through 1,000.  So,

```named_tuple = {X1 = (1, 2, 3 ... 1,000), X2 = (1, 4, 9 ... 1,000,000), X3 = (1, 8, 27 ... 1,000,000,000))

df = DataFrame([named_tuple])
```

text: You should avoid using tuples with many elements (more than e.g. 100)
